bach.Series.append¶

Series.append(other, ignore_index=False)[source]¶

Append rows of other series to the caller series.

Parameters

  • other (Union[bach.series.series.Series, List[bach.series.series.Series]]) – objects to be added

  • ignore_index (bool) – if true, drops indexes of all objects to be appended

Returns

a new series with all rows from appended other or self if other is empty.

Return type

bach.series.series.Series
